mapper.sql: a.ID AS "id", a.TYPE AS "type", a.TITLE AS "title", a.CONTENT AS "content", a.FILES AS "files", a.STATUS AS "status", a.CREATE_BY AS "createBy.id", a.CREATE_DATE AS "createDate", a.UPDATE_BY AS "updateBy.id", a.UPDATE_DATE AS "updateDate", a.REMARKS AS "remarks", a.DEL_FLAG AS "delFlag", a.PUSH_TYPE AS "pushType", a.RESULT AS "result", a.MSG_TOTAL AS "msgTotal", a.MSG_PROCESS AS "msgProcess", a.CLICK_NUM AS "clickNum", a.START_TIME AS "startTime", a.END_TIME AS "endTime", a.CONTENT_ID AS "contentId", a.PUSH_NUM AS "pushNum", b.read_num, b.un_read_num

LEFT JOIN ( SELECT r.oa_notify_id, sum(case when r.read_flag = '1' then 1 else 0 end) read_num, sum(case when r.read_flag != '1' then 1 else 0 end) un_read_num FROM mtmydb.mtmy_oa_notify_record r WHERE r.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY r.oa_notify_id ) b ON b.oa_notify_id = a.id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_oa_notify( ID, TYPE, TITLE, CONTENT, FILES, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, REMARKS, DEL_FLAG, PUSH_TYPE, START_TIME, END_TIME
) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{title}, #{content}, #{files}, 0, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{pushType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mtmydb.mtmy_oa_notify SET TYPE = #{type}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, FILES = #{files}, STATUS = #{status}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy.id}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate}, REMARKS = #{remarks}, PUSH_TYPE = #{pushType}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, END_TIME = #{endTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id as notify_id, title as title, type as notify_type, start_time as start_time, end_time as end_time, content as content, push_type as push_type from mtmydb.mtmy_oa_notify where id = #{notify_id}

select uc.client_id from mtmydb.mtmy_oa_notify n left join mtmydb.mtmy_oa_notify_record nr on nr.oa_notify_id = n.id left join mtmydb.mtmy_oa_user_client uc on uc.user_id = nr.user_id where n.id = #{notify_id} and uc.client_id is not null
